text: James Russell Lowell was an American Romantic poet, critic, editor, and diplomat. He is associated with the Fireside Poets, a group of New English Poets that were the first to be noted as popular as the English ones of that time. == Related pages == *List of poets from North America == References == Category:1819 births Category:1891 deaths Category:American poets Category:American editors Category:American diplomats
title: James Russell Lowell
